name: Ethan White
bio: Associate Professor and Moore Investigator in the Department of Wildlife Ecology and Conservation and the Informatics Institute at the University of Florida
quote: Software Carpentry training has had a tremendous influence on the productivity of the students in my lab and several other labs on campus.
